title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 381.9 - Limitations on reimbursement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 381.9 - Limitations on reimbursement

State Regulations
(a) Reimbursement in ADC. Federal and State
reimbursement may be claimed on all eligible grants of assistance in
ADC. (b) Reimbursement in HR. State
reimbursement may be claimed on all eligible grants of assistance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
381.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
